page.title: 05JENNINGS FACTORY
page.content: }Jennings deals with laboratory equipment but they do not make many of their own products. The only thing that they make, is done by the owner, Mr.Jennings,who blows glass and has invented a couple of things as well. Jennings first went into business in {1952}but only moved to East Bridgford in{1967. Many of the chemicals are corrosive. Jennings sell their products to all of the U.K. and to some other countries as well. There are{17}workers in Jennings,and {5}of them are from East Bridgford.They work for{8\}hours a day(9am-5.30pm). Before Jennings,the factory was being used by a Nottingham electronic firm. Before then it was Batchelors peas, and before that Masons peas. A prototype video recorder was invented on these premises.
